name: Preswald
title: preswald.com
shortDescription: Preswald is a development platform that transforms Python scripts into interactive dashboards, reports, and tools. It's designed for developers, analysts, and researchers who need to deploy data apps quickly. Users can build apps visually, collaborate in real-time, and deploy without a backend, making it ideal for internal tools, exploratory analysis, and client-facing dashboards.

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Retool
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers more general app building features

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Streamlit
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Focuses on Python and data science
